Posted By: David Seaborn
Leon,

You should have received and email with the two scans yesterday morning (I thought it was unusual not to hear from you right away)...yes, I am holding those two for you right now.  If you don't have the scans I'll resend them tonight.  Marc- I'm waiting on one other person about the Haddock, once I hear from him, I'll let you know.  Please rest assured if you've emailed me I've got you on my radar screen.  Am taking the emails in the order they are received so it may take a little while for me to get back to everyone, but I will.  I'll also update this page tonight to indicate which Mayos have been sold and which are left.  Thanks, Dave

Posted By: David Seaborn
Ten of the Mayos have now been sold, there are still nine more graded Mayos available.  Please email me if interested.  Thanks!

Posted By: David Seaborn
So far 11 of our Mayos have gone to seven different board members.  It's great to see these cards getting spread around the board into several collecotr's hands!  Keep the offers coming!
